Deals Physical DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies and stuns them for 0.2s, then places Mind Blur on them for 10s. Mind Blur: Reduces Physical DEF by 5% of Avil's Physical DEF each time the inflicted enemies take damage. Can stack up to 100%.
